articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Artifact is getting an AI-powered text-to-speech feature to read you the news
articles.description: Artifact — the news app from Instagram co-founders Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger — is adding an AI-powered text-to-speech feature that will read you news articles. Snoop Dogg and Gwyneth Paltrow are two of the voices that you can listen to.
